Front-End Dev && UI/UX Designer

Zhukov Bogdan

I’m 23 years old, and I’m studying Front-End while also exploring UI/UX design and learning Back-End. I’m a creative person with a knack for generating ideas and turning them into reality. I strive for growth and development. I have 1 year of development experience but no commercial experience yet. In the future, I want to master Back-End and become a Full-Stack web developer.

EDUCATION && HOBBIES

  • Current Studies:

    I have a high school diploma, and I am currently studying in college, majoring in Computer Engineering, where I am working towards an associate degree. In the future, I plan to continue my education and obtain a higher degree in this field.

  • Self-Development:

    I am actively engaged in self-development: I have studied with a tutor, taken online courses, and I am also independently learning and practicing the acquired knowledge.

  • Hobbies:

    I have various hobbies. I enjoy outdoor activities and music, and I play the guitar. Being a creative person, I take pleasure in creating previews, images, and various designs. I also like tinkering with computers and assembling them. In my free time, I play computer games, preferring genres like survival, racing, RPGs, and shooters.
